message:
Can anyone help point me to a group that's only focused on DevOps/SRE practice? I'm trying to connect with Egyptians working within that space as I'd love to discuss the latest trends and pick their minds over their approach and execution methodologies they pertain to. 

To give you more of a background, I recently joined a hedge fund led startup where I'm getting the unique opportunity to lay the foundation to their entire SRE practice. I'd love to discuss more with some fellow engineers and I'm honestly very intrigued to listen from someone first-hand involved within that space in Egypt.

Cheers!

data.message: I don't remember having any egyptian group focused only on DevOps. There was a meetup group and we had one meetup, but the group was then removed because of inactivity.

I have created this group calling for who it may concern to have experience in DevOps field. It ay not contain experienced members as there is no much Egyptians working in this field, however we are trying to share as much knowledge as we can
You may join the group and I will be glad if you can share your current knowledge. Your interest is enough 
https://www.facebook.com/groups/1012517482161590/
